text: Ke timila'i yasa kurabata ascarya lagyo ki, timiharumadhyebata e'uta manisadvara timro palanakartako tarphabata timiche'u satya'upadesa ayo taki usale timila'i dara dekha'os? Ra timi yo nabhulnu ki timro palanakartale nuhako jati pascata timila'i tyasako uttaradhikari banayo, ra akarama timila'i badhi vyapakata pradana garyo, tasartha allahaka anukampaharula'i smarana gara taki mukti prapta garna saka
